# Strategy & Stack

> Build Your Sales Engine Without Building a Sales Team

## What We Do

Strategy & Stack provides Sales Architecture: Five modular blueprints that install lead generation systems using automation, AI, and battle-tested processes—delivering results that would traditionally require 3x to 5x more staff.

We install complete sales infrastructure in weeks, not months. Clients own everything we build, with 50-70% time savings vs. manual approaches.

## The Problem We Solve

Most service businesses hit a ceiling. Not because they can't get more clients—but because they've grown through referrals and have no predictable outbound system. Building one manually takes hundreds of hours and countless mistakes.

## Our Solution

We install complete sales infrastructure in weeks, not months. You get the systems, you own everything we build, and you see it working before deciding to continue.

## The Five Blueprints

### Blueprint 1: Account Setup ($8,125)
The foundation for everything. 2-3 weeks from kickoff.
- 2 custom domains with SPF, DKIM, and DMARC
- 10 email inboxes warmed to 95%+ deliverability
- 2 LinkedIn profiles optimized for your ICP
- 1 conversion-focused landing page
- Manual: 120+ hours | Blueprint: 35 hours

### Blueprint 2: Content ($2,625)
Build trust before your first message lands. 12 weeks of content.
- 26 platform-native posts for LinkedIn and Instagram
- 40/30/30 framework: Educational, Personal, Sales
- Carousels and static posts for reach
- Reusable content calendar system
- Manual: 80+ hours | Blueprint: 15 hours

### Blueprint 3: Ads ($7,750)
Paid advertising that accelerates everything. 30 days managed.
- Campaigns on Meta, Google, and LinkedIn
- 12 ads designed for conversion
- Budget pacing and optimization
- Performance reporting
- Manual: 60-80+ hours | Blueprint: 23 hours

### Blueprint 4: Outbound ($4,875)
Direct outreach that scales. 90 days, 1,000 leads.
- 1,000 qualified leads contacted
- Multi-step email and LinkedIn sequences
- Automated follow-ups with reply detection
- Live reporting dashboard
- Manual: 170-230+ hours | Blueprint: 26 hours

### Blueprint 5: Process Automation (Custom)
AI-powered workflow automation.
- Lead capture to CRM with enrichment
- Client onboarding workflows
- AI-powered email drafting
- Automated reporting dashboards

## Packages

### Starter — $11,750
Account Setup + Outbound Blueprint (90 days)
Save $1,250 vs. separate blueprints

### Growth — $13,750 (Most Popular)
Account Setup + Content (12 weeks) + Outbound (90 days)
Save $1,875 vs. separate blueprints

### Full Stack — $21,000
All four sales blueprints
Save $2,375 vs. separate blueprints

### Scale — Custom Quote
Full Stack + Custom process automation
Revenue share option available

## Who This Is For

- US-based service businesses: CPA firms, law firms, agencies, consultancies, SaaS
- Cash flow positive companies grown through referrals
- Teams with capacity but no outbound system
- Business owners who prefer hiring experts
- Companies ready for predictable lead flow

## What We Guarantee

- The work gets done: emails sent, profiles optimized, ads launched
- Systems configured correctly and running
- Full visibility into activity and metrics
- You own everything we build
